channel.title: [317] Text on custom interface [317] Rep++
channel.description:
How would I add text to this custom interface?
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2mqqooj.png[/img]
I want to add text like a quest list scroll has.
I want to add the text in my client.java (Server side) so I can re-edit them as I go.
How do I do that?
